website_summaries.verdict: A versatile cushion that can be used for increasing the difficulty of exercise or as a seat cushion.
pros: Made of a durable material that won't pop or puncture
Doubles as an ergonomic seat cushion
cons: Some users have had trouble getting the cushion to inflate with the provided pump

customer_reviews.title: used as "wiggle seat"
customer_reviews.text: I purchase 2 of these in blue for my 7 year old son. He has autism and adhd. He has one for school and one for home. It is used as a "wiggle seat". He gets sensory input and can wiggle in his seat when he feels the urge to move around. One side has small bumps and the other the bumps are a little bigger and higher so he can choose which side is best for him that day. We also use it when he wants the sensation of standing on something to wiggle around. I think this would be great for all children. My son is always saying that his friends in class want his wiggle seat.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer W Davis

customer_reviews.title: Meeting the Needs of Children by Using Wobble Cushions in the Classroom
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the wobble cushions to use as a flexible seating option in my fourth grade classroom. I am more than pleased with the exceptional quality and performance!
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Work your core at work!
customer_reviews.text: Work your core while sitting at your desk! Subtle yet effective exercise to alleviate that sedentary desk job. I used it at the initial setting for two weeks then inflated it. No issues with that and now I am having to work a little harder to stay balanced. I have combined this item with an under desk elliptical and find that they enhance each other in terms of exercise. Big bank for a little buck!
customer_reviews.author: Atlantan

customer_reviews.title: great product for my office following a spine injury
customer_reviews.text: In general these discs are great because they allow for me to sit for longer periods of time without decompressing my spine (I have a herniated disc in my lumbar). The product itself is good and study. No surprises. It came already inflated and ready to use. I'm using it in office at the moment! I can't believe it was so cheap given the amount of relief it gives me and all the ridiculous expensive products they have out there that could have wasted my money on instead. Not only that, it's far more discreet and easier to keep "stable" on than one of those weird giant balls my office-mate sits on! :)
customer_reviews.author: Alissa

customer_reviews.title: So far I am very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: So far I am very happy with this product. I bought it to sit on and 'activate my core', per recommendations for a back problem. I have seen a few reviews about it being hard to inflate, etc. Reading the packaging indicated that it is already inflated in a way that should work, and I agree, no additional air is needed in this thing to get it to do what it is supposed to do. I think the people who are complaining that they cannot get it 'filled' may not get the point of what this product is for. In any case, the cushion is holding air, comfortable and does what I expected it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Wish I'd had one long ago
customer_reviews.text: I like this wobble cushion very much! It is causing my "core" to get some actual exercise while I work at my desk all day. A tip for inflating: mine was not filled with much air when it arrived. You can press down on the side of the disk to form a larger internal area around the needle for the pump so that you can avoid puncturing the opposite side and doing this allows you to press firmly enough to get the needle all the way in without issue. I intend to update this review later re: pain relief, after I've had an opportunity to use the cushion for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Dahlia Bristow

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Wiggles and no not those Australian kid show hosts
customer_reviews.text: These at great for anyone. I bought it for my son who has an abundance of energy and wriggles around a lot in school. But we decided to keep it at home. We all love it at the computer chair, it is great on the back. Not only that you can use it for strengthening exercises.
customer_reviews.author: RJ Rice

customer_reviews.title: Won't Inflate.  Pump is cheap.
customer_reviews.text: The pump is cheap and I'm not even sure it works. I tried to pump this disc up for an hour and it would not inflate. There are no holes, so I'm not sure what the problem is. The disc seems small for an office chair, but again, haven't been able to try it out because it wouldn't inflate.
customer_reviews.author: angisworld

customer_reviews.title: Pump pin easily broke.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I thought it was going to help with sciatica. However, the air hole is in a bad place. When inserting the pin into the hole, I easily punctured the other side of the cushion! I fixed the hole with a patch. The second time (as it did not hold air well) I inserted at an angle as to not puncture the other side and the pin broke. I won't be able to tell you if it helped with sciatica because it never worked at all. Fill hole needs to be moved to the side of the cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Judi Pike

customer_reviews.title: A solid review that doesn't wobble!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Works well. It is not easy to inflate it, however. The needle doesn't go in ALL THE WAY and thus, air does not seem to go in. But the inflation it comes with works just fine. Just discovered that you have to PUSH the needle really hard to make it go in. But be careful you don't push through the other side!
customer_reviews.author: Randy Martin

customer_reviews.title: Using for dog exercises
customer_reviews.text: Product well packaged and as described. I got this to help my older dog (8 years old) stay limber and strong with balancing exercises. After a short lesson, she figured out the front feet placement, and I'll slowly work on her placing her back feet for rear strengthening. The 2 younger dogs desire training treats, so they're also learning to use it. The cushion seems very sturdy. It comes mostly inflated, with a pump to inflate more if desired. I'm using it at the default volume right now. For the dogs, they stand on the less nobbly side. I tried sitting on it, and I'm thinking I might get another one for my desk chair :)
customer_reviews.author: M.A.T.

customer_reviews.title: Helps with stability
customer_reviews.text: Have had a severe mountain bike accident 2 yrs ago and I am still rehabbing. Had problems with hip and core flexibility found the exercise ball too dangerous. Physical therapist suggested this inflatable cushion. Have been using it for 4 months and I have noticed a difference in hip flexion. Would recommend this for order adults ( I am 74+ yrs old) as an alternative to the large exercise ball.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: Poor air retention
customer_reviews.text: I tried 2 of the wobble discs,. Neither would accept or hold air. Very disappointing product.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Helps with core stability
customer_reviews.text: I was sent the wrong color initially but it was too much of a hassle to return it so I just bought a 2nd one hoping I would get the right color. And I did. And so now almost everyone in my office has tried it out all with the same amazed response. It really does force you to work a lot of micro muscle groups to maintain your balance when sitting standing kneeling or exercising on it. It's surprisingly durable/well made and I like the different tactile nubby choices.
customer_reviews.author: DopplerDanni

customer_reviews.title: After sitting on the Wobble Cushion while using the computer for several days, I wish I'd bought it years ago!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many methods to manage my chronic lower back pain while working at the computer, but none have helped. Sitting on an exercise ball is too low, and the movement is distracting. Using a kneeling chair is too restrictive and uncomfortable for my knees. When I alternate between sitting and standing in front of the computer, it's hard to achieve the right keyboard/screen height. Taking frequent "stretching" breaks disrupts my train of thought. In contrast, the Wobble Cushion allows just enough movement of the core and lower back while sitting, and does not distract attention from my work. So grateful to my friend who recommended this!
customer_reviews.author: NancyC

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 4 and has had such a difficult time sitting still during a meal or coloring. She has SPD and this little wobble cushion has been a godsend. The first time we used it, THE FIRST TIME, she sat for 15 minutes and ate her dinner without getting up. THIS IS HUGE. She would get up no less than 20 times and we would have to continually redirect her. I am so excited that this actually seems to work! She LOVES this and we love that it is easy to transport and that it helps her sit and focus. GET IT.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Woodruff

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I just started using this today. I didn't want to sit on a ball at work, but wanted the benefits. I was a little skeptical about this product, but I can feel it working in my core. I really like that it came already blown up, so it was ready to use out of the box. The black blends in with my office chair, so it's not super noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: K. Junker

customer_reviews.title: Balance Trainer 💕
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 8 of these for my fitness studio, they are perfect to use when incorporating balance into your workout plans, these are perfect for everything from squats, planks, pushups, single leg work, bridges etc. They are compact in size which is great for storage. Only con was inflation some of them were easier to inflate than others, it may take a few trys to-get the needle to fully insert into the cushion to get air inside.
customer_reviews.author: this game is top notch.

customer_reviews.title: Failure to inflate equals failure to launch
customer_reviews.text: Because you cannot inflate it , it makes it impossible to get the level of comfort or stability intended. I tried desperately to inflate this and it simply wouldn’t. It broke the first needle and when I bought additional needles, they didn’t fare any better. I was so excited & I really wanted this to work to help me with my balance, & to engage my core while using my standing desk, but I wish I had just purchased a standing mat instead. I didn’t return it because I had already thrown out the packaging but I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Danni

customer_reviews.title: Could be better, but works
customer_reviews.text: It works, but doesn't have as much air as some I've used in Physical Therapy, so the difficulty is not exactly where I'd want it to be (the more air/the higher it is, the harder it is to balance, and as you progress in strengthening the stability of your ankles or knees with this, you want the difficulty level to be far enough not to plateau). If it were more difficult to begin with, I could prop my hand on a stable object nearby and progress the difficulty as I pleased. Here I will only be able to progress a couple of levels.
customer_reviews.author: DGraham

customer_reviews.title: Great for the classroom!
customer_reviews.text: This seat cushion was recommended to us by my son's teacher, so we purchased one at the beginning of the school year. It has held up perfectly to classroom use by my 1st grader and we are 6 months into the school year. He actually wants to use it during class. When it arrived, I thought I needed to fill it more, as it wasn't completely full. I was incorrect. It was out of the box ready for my kid to use. So just check to see if it is comfortable at about 85% before attempting to get more air in it, as overfilling makes it uncomfortable. We will be buying one for my daughter when she starts kindergarten.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: I use this for driving I’ve used other brands before but this one is superior in quality, and ease of inflation. The valve system does not depend on a plug (which keeps popping out on other brands) so I think it will last much longer. It is a bit on the small side if you have a more than average behind but I find it fits my car seat fine, and its very comfortable driving with it. I like the side that has the pin cushion things, more circulation
customer_reviews.author: c.c.c.

customer_reviews.title: good for more than one thing
customer_reviews.text: My deep fascia massage guy and my chiropractor recommended this wobbly cousin. I pulled my back and was having spasms as work. Painful to sit or stand for long periods. I got one for my car and office and it really feels better to sit on it instead if just the chair. I also plan to use it as a balance platform when my back heals.
customer_reviews.author: Jillybean16

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: This product is well made of what appears to be durable, thick plastic. They came inflated at the perfect level. Instructions are included as well exercises with explanations and pictures. There is a pump included. I am completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: bswslp

customer_reviews.title: Troubles with inflating but wonderful company and product to deal with.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second order of this disc. I need it to improve balance after a serious fall down a flight of stairs. The first disc wouldn't inflate much but the second one inflected with the first try. The company was most helpful with me and sent another pump for the disc but that wouldn't fit the opening so I ended up buy another disc since I never did find where we put it after inflating the first time. The first pump wouldn't hold the air in but the company gave me a very helpful hint on how to do it easily and it worked perfectly the first time on the second disc.
customer_reviews.author: irish112

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: And to those that are worried about poking holes - I don't understand how that's possible! If you use common sense, this fills easily. Obviously the needle is longer than the thickness of the two sides (top and bottom) when un-inflated, so simply insert enough (without gorilla force) to get the tip between the top and bottom and begin pumping. Once it expands you can fully insert the needle and continue pumping.
customer_reviews.author: Inman Lanier

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This unit is identical to the ones I used during PT. The pumps worked great so not sure why other reviewers had problems with them. However, a bicycle pump would work or even a air compressor set for very low pressure. They work great and allow me to do the same exercises at home that I did at PT. Very high quality!! They come with a basket ball needle so can be aired up with any air pump that can be set to low pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Suitcase_2

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: I have had it for months now. I put it under a pad on my chair at the dining table, so I sit on it at every meal and when doing paperwork or going through mail. I have lower back issues, and this device helps a lot. It did not work well on my office chair at the computer, but it saves me some serious agony in those other instances.
customer_reviews.author: careful shopper

customer_reviews.title: A gift for your lower back.
customer_reviews.text: My chiropractor has these on the chairs in his office. It’s a must have if you have arthritis or lower back issues and you sit at a computer a lot because it causes you to wobble which makes you flex and move your lower back. Helps prevent stiffness. Comfortable to sit on. I think it engages your core muscles just a bit too.
customer_reviews.author: Sue S.

customer_reviews.title: Durable and a Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT deal. It works perfect. I think I would like to see a smooth side for ONE of the sides because it does leave marks on your legs if you sit on it with a dress on. Also if you stand on it in socks if your feet are sensitive, smooth would be great. But I love that you can inflate to your desire and it helps if you want to do pelvic rocks while in your chair you can tone your tummy. I also like standing on it, it helps get "steps" in while you are in one spot on your computer. It is super durable wither way!!
customer_reviews.author: ccsosa6

customer_reviews.title: Small cushion Big results.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this cushion for week. It’s been very useful to me. l have not been able to find a comfortable sitting position no matter how I position myself. This cushion helps me a lot. I am able to sit for an hour and am able to get up without back pain and stiffness. Honestly, I am surprised it does work for me but it does. Kudos!
customer_reviews.author: M. V. Cour

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoy it, quite a few people also bought them ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this at work in my chair. It helps me to sit up straight and focus. I really enjoy it, quite a few people also bought them now for the office. I also bought one for my car (broke my tailbone so sitting for long periods of time is painful) but did not work out for the car, so I just kept it in my home office.
customer_reviews.author: Ellza Tesny

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The disc is great if you can get it to inflate. 3 out of 5 ordered would not inflate.
customer_reviews.author: diana

customer_reviews.title: Helps calm and allows for quiet movement
customer_reviews.text: This helps our active child stay seated during meals. He wobbles it. It has two textured sides. One is like sitting on nails to me! That’s the side he loves. More pressure apparently makes him calm. Easy to clean. We rinse it when it has crumbs on it which is daily. We have even packed it on a vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: sturdy seat cushion
customer_reviews.text: Have the Bintiva on a chair where I spend way too much computer time. Hoping to trick my core into a bit of strengthening. I added some air to increase the wobble and it's ok. The increase in core tension is subtle but happening all the same. The Bintiva seems to check all of the boxes as advertized.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Helps with back pain and posture.
customer_reviews.text: Helps stimulate your back while working long days at the computer. I use it about twice a day for 30 minutes. You can still slouch back while using it so I try to sit as forward in my chair as possible so that I don't slouch. Very helpful product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PUNCTURE RISK
customer_reviews.text: Happy to get this package on time for my work in exercise, but immediately punctured while blowing it up. It mentions that as a possibility in the directions, didn't know it would be so easy to puncture. I really needed this for work and now have to wait to get another one. Is is possible to keep the pump (as to not waste another pump) and send back the punctured disc so as to waste less?
customer_reviews.author: s

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the modern office - small, sturdy, and easy to change through day
customer_reviews.text: Love it. This adds variety to the day. My doctors have always told me variety, changing while staying in healthy positions, helps in the long run. This cushion is that. I can sit on it, rest my feet on it, use it for lumbar support, and even stand or partially stand on it. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Blake

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! We might Need two in our house
customer_reviews.text: I use this between chiropractor appointments sometimes and love it. My son “stole” it when schooling from home started and loved sitting on it while he worked. It Kept his overall fidgets down and he thought it was really comfortable. Has stood up well! We haven’t had to do much maintenance (inflating again) and have really liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle F.

customer_reviews.title: Used for standing balance
customer_reviews.text: I'm using my disc to stand on, to help restore the ability to control my balance . I found that the level of inflation upon delivery was just right; it's inflated enough to prevent my feet from touching the floor through the disc but unstable enough to feel "wobbly" and make my body correct the balance.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Wobble seat
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my daughter. It is helping her sit at a desk and focus in school. As a teacher I have several of these in my own classroom and they are amazing. Sitting on a "wobble seat" truly helps several of my distracted/hyperactive students to be able to focus and work in a group. I only wish I had a few more of these for other students!
customer_reviews.author: Jmuel

customer_reviews.title: A hit in the classroom.
customer_reviews.text: Might be one of the best investments I ever made for my classroom. I got three, and will get a few more for the new school year. The kiddos like being able to choose which side is up, and I adjusted the squishiness so they could wiggle without bouncing too much. Not all students like these, the bumps are a new sensation and students with OCD or haptic issues might not do well. But for kids who just need to move or who should improve their core muscles, these are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: K. Stidham

customer_reviews.title: Thoughtfully Designed
customer_reviews.text: Great product with plenty of versatility! I really like that the Bintiva cushion can be used in several ways - passively or actively, for wiggly bums at school, better posture at work, yoga or aerobics at home or in the studio. The nubbies are short on one side, more prominent on the other, so it can be flipped for different needs and users. My 4th grade daughter has a wiggly bum and is using it now, and my 9th grade daughter wants one for core muscle fitness and athletic training. I'm considering one for work to improve circulation and posture. It's rugged enough that I've no doubt it'll stand up to whatever we use it for!
customer_reviews.author: Cail Johnstone

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment. Not worth trying.
customer_reviews.text: This item doesn’t retain its inflation. Keeps losing air. Cheap and not quality. Wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CrownCityGirl

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Stability Cushion
customer_reviews.text: Four years ago, I suffered a hip problem and while doing physical therapy for 10 weeks, my PT person told me that I had stability problems. They had one of these stability cushions and they had me using it. I purchase mine in 2016 and have been using it since then with great results. In my Yoga for Athletes class, I am able to stand erect on each of my legs. The Bintiva cushion is extremely well made and loses very little air. But since it comes with an air pump and needle, I can inflate it to the desired air pressure. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: D. Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Instant lower back pain relieve
customer_reviews.text: Towards the deadline of a project computer hours get really long and tension goes really up, very much tensing up the lower back leading to quite a lot of pain. This cushion keeps your back constantly moving, which means the muscles too are constantly moving and cannot tense up to "brick'-mode. It's an incredible help!
customer_reviews.author: Vera Lucia Calabria

customer_reviews.title: The best thing is
customer_reviews.text: Works. I will be a while getting my balance back long enough to stand on it for any length of time, but I think it is helping me work on my balance. The best thing is, I have fibromyalgia and polymyalgia rheumatica. Sitting for any length of time leaves me in pain. If I sit on the wobble, I do much better. I think it should be advertised as an aid for these problems. I would recommend the wobble.
customer_reviews.author: scc1234

customer_reviews.title: Strengthen Core Abdominal Muscles
customer_reviews.text: I was having back pain - hurt to sit. It was a nice cushion at work and at home. But, I just had back surgery and as part of my rehab, I will take this to work with me and overtime, inflate it more... this will help strengthen my core and hopefully prevent future back issues. As you sit on it, you CAN feel your abdominal muscles work to keep you balanced/sitting up straight.
customer_reviews.author: Grace143

customer_reviews.title: This wobble cushion was recommended by my physical therapist to help restore core muscles ...
customer_reviews.text: This wobble cushion was recommended by my physical therapist to help restore core muscles after spinal fusion. Once I adjusted the pressure it began improving my posture by stabilizing and strengthening the weakened muscles. The included pump and needle works to both deflate and inflate the cushion.Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Shipley

customer_reviews.title: So far, good purchase
customer_reviews.text: This cushion is well made, it's yoga ball material. I bought this for my son with ADHD. He can't sit still when eating and doing homework. He has already broke the welding on one of our stools by rocking it too much. With this, he only moves the cushion and not the stool. So far so good. Also, my husband was sitting on the couch with it and said it made his tailbone feel better. So it looks like I'll be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: Cheri N

customer_reviews.title: Kindergarten Tested and Approved
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cushion for one of my Kindergarten students. It has helped tremendously when we are sitting on the carpet! He is able to move just enough. This student likes that he can choose which side he sits on. He prefers the side that is a little smoother than the other. We have also used this cushion in chair at our tables. I like the quality of the cushion. It seems to be made from a durable material. If it can survive a few weeks in Kindergarten, it can survive nearly anything.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. E

customer_reviews.title: So glad that I bought this little wonder!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! All the benefits of a balance ball without looking goofy in the office. I've really noticed an improvement in back pain and fatigue. I've tried the memory foam and gel cushions before and still felt achy at the end of the day. I've only had my balance disc for a few days so I haven't noticed any core results yet, but I feel so much better after work so it's well worth the purchase. I did pump it up a bit more because it was too squishy for me, but the included pump worked fine. My coworkers have tried mine and will be ordering their own soon.
customer_reviews.author: Cubicleslave

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my son
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son who was diagnosed with ADHD and has trouble sitting in a chair. Once you receive this cushion, he enjoys sitting on it so much that his bottom rarely leaves the chair. I'm ordering another one for his school to have as well. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: teacherchick

customer_reviews.title: Realy worked for our son
customer_reviews.text: This disc was recommended by our son's teacher and an occupational therapist friend of mine, to keep my active son seated during school. His teacher reports a marked difference in his behavior and concentration. I bought one for my house as well and it has made homework much more manageable. No more wiggling and rocking, as he gets the movement he craves by trying to stay balanced. My husband sometimes uses it when he needs to work at the computer for long periods of time, and he says it takes the strain off his back and shoulders. The disc came inflated and ready to use which is great, and the quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Helps very much with back pain / posture
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a suggestion from my chiropractor. Use it at work all the time. Helps elevate my lower back pain, as well as helps with my posture. Is pretty great because the pump it comes allows you to increase/decrease the firmness of cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy the orange one!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this twice in this particular color (orange) and both times these arrived damaged. All other colors ordered were fine. Not sure what is up with these. Also they did not come with a pump either. Had to return twice.
customer_reviews.author: Cani2006

customer_reviews.title: Fire up those stability muscles
customer_reviews.text: You can definitely feel your abs engage when sitting on this thing. Maybe I am just *that* out of shape, but I could feel the lactic acid burning goodness about a minute after sitting down. Phew! I look forward to trying the exercises that came with the cushion.
customer_reviews.author: belleteterouge

customer_reviews.title: Great for expecting moms
customer_reviews.text: I actually used this behind my back in my office chair during my second and third trimesters. I haven’t used it post pregnancy yet but when I go back to work I’m sure it’ll be just as supportive.
customer_reviews.author: Jessicalea03

customer_reviews.title: impressed
customer_reviews.text: a lot more sturdy than I thought. my students love them. I have 8 in my classroom of middle schoolers and kids love them... they just like to try to sit on 3 at a time...
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas T. Von Hoene

customer_reviews.title: Pump doesn't work. Have to find some other way ...
customer_reviews.text: Pump doesn't work. Have to find some other way to fill with air...more info to follow. 1 star for now.
customer_reviews.author: Tucee

customer_reviews.title: Great for arthritis!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has juvenile arthritis, and she struggles to sit in plastic chairs at school all day. I bought her a wiggle seat to add some cushion without being obnoxiously obvious to the other students that she needs accommodations. She used it for 2 days and already can feel a difference. You can inflate it to the ideal comfort level, and I love that it came with a pump. Great buy and great quality! I will be buying more for the teacher's classroom wishlist.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Great posture device
customer_reviews.text: I have chronic back pain and spinal fusions. My physical therapist recommended this disc for me, to sit on while at my computer. It is working really well at helping me keep my posture right, and gives me a little bit of core exercise at the same time. The pain that used to develop in my mid back while sitting at my machine is gone.
customer_reviews.author: Susan L. Mack

customer_reviews.title: Relief for sciatica leg pain
customer_reviews.text: I sit on an exercise ball chair at work, but do not have one at home. After sitting for any length of time on a regular chair with my legs at a 90 degree angle, I experience pain down my right leg (possibly from sciatica or a by-product of arthritic hip). However, this inflated disc has solved my problem. It gives me enough flexibility and enough of a slight angle for my legs that my hip pain is relieved. I also use one in the car when I drive. I would highly recommend this product. It has proven a great benefit for me.
customer_reviews.author: Karen F

customer_reviews.title: just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I am using this to support balance and core strength as a person with parkinson's. It is exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Sue K. Neyhard

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Ya, I have the wobble cushion. Had ordered one for myself and a friend wanted to order one for her mother who is in a wheelchair all day, so I gave her mine, and ordered myself another. I had back surgery, about a year and a half ago (micro lumbar discectomy) and tend to be careful about bending too much or moving too far from center. This cushion is really good for strengthening your core while staying centered and also quite comfortable. I use it on my desk chair in front of my computer. Will be trying the suggested exercise uses when I get a chance. Happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Louise M. Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Great for an at home PT program
customer_reviews.text: I used one of these in PT for a case of achilles tendonitis. Since the condition is chronic and rears it's head every now and then, I decided to duplicate some of the equipment and exercises that I did in PT at home to try to prevent more flare-ups. The Bintiva is helpful to that end. It is a small piece of equipment that stores away easily, is easy to use, and by using this at home as part of a home program - I am not having to visit the foot doctor or go back to PT.
customer_reviews.author: JustMe

customer_reviews.title: great for balance, core and posture
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for 3 days, and I noticed how much it works your obliques and quads. I sit 10 hours a day, and desperately need core work. You can use it for balance and core strengthening. I'm sitting on it as I type this. It, definitely, improves posture. I wish someone would have suggested this to me 30 years ago when I began working desk jobs.
customer_reviews.author: tina mech

customer_reviews.title: Think of it as one of my favorite toys
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Use it as a sitting cushion and it supports good posture. Also like to play with it with the suggestions that came with it. It's fun and strengthens core.
customer_reviews.author: ethel marie

customer_reviews.title: Wobble Wobble
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my office chair at work. I may purchase another one for home. The product is as described - at first glance upon opening I thought it flat and wouldn't work, but upon sitting on it I realized it does have a wobble that lends itself to good posture and use of balance. I have not used the pump yet as I felt it was pumped perfect for me on arrival. I think this is a good value for the money. I have only had it for ~2 months but no problems so far. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jain

customer_reviews.title: You won't regret your purchase
customer_reviews.text: This product was intended to replace a previously purchased one that developed a hole. Not only is this product virtually identical to the other one, but it cost a little over half the price I paid a few years ago for the same disc that is marketed as an ergonomic sewing supply. I love it and would not hesitate to buy another one if I find I need an extra or two.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect (and less expensive) Alternative to an Exercise Ball Chair
customer_reviews.text: My coworker uses an exercise ball in lieu of a deskchair at work. I have been reluctant to get a ball because of space and not being sure what "height" to get. I got this cushion and both and she and I agree that it mimics the same core workout as an exercise chair. It's also better than a wobble stool because it's "softer" so I can tolerate it for longer periods of time. My only complaint is that the rubber "sticks" to bare legs. So when I wore a shorter skirt.. getting up was a little painful. :P All in all.. I'm VERY happy with this purchase and will recommend it to other coworkers as well.
customer_reviews.author: AKM

customer_reviews.title: amazing results
customer_reviews.text: I am using my cushion for core strength to help with my posture and also balance. It is amazing that it has also helped my back discomfort. I feel that I am standing up taller and what a difference. Now my daughter bought one and two of the women she works with are going to get them also. I am so happy I discovered this thanks to a wonderful physical therapist.
customer_reviews.author: Hey Jude

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter who can’t stay seated during meals. I have no idea how it works, but it does. The first meal, it didn’t, but from that point forward, it’s been a huge improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Stu

customer_reviews.title: I use this in the car because I have hamstring issues and sitting in car is painful. I have it inflated just enough so that ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to get another one of these as old one finally got a hole or just wore out. I use this in the car because I have hamstring issues and sitting in car is painful. I have it inflated just enough so that when I sit on it- it "floats" me- no uneven pressure points. I've used this for years- actually suggested by my Pilates instructor.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce G.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for improving posture and core strength
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! I'm tall (6 3), have a desk job, and slouch. Sitting on this cushion, uninflated, it just automatically perked up my posture and tightened up my core. It really is cool. Well worth the price. Comfortable to sit on, really well made, and, again, it just sort of makes you sit taller and staighter without you even thinking about it. I haven't even seen what it does inflated because I'm just so happy with it out of the box! Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Keith S Beauregard

customer_reviews.title: Its Ok
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited about this product but using it actually caused more pain than anything. I tried using it on a chair and that was painful and not comfortable at all. My husband threw the box away so I couldn't return it so I gave it another shot and used it on the floor for meditation and we have a winner! My kid and I use it when sitting down on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Monica De Leon

customer_reviews.title: Very happy and glad I got it
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with getting this for my 9 year old who has ADHD. Right away I could tell the difference in her using it at the kitchen table. She says she loves it too. She can't wait to take it to school even to help her. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Andria

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have used the balance disc in my office chair for well over a year. Its great. Less back and neck pain when I sit for long hours. I'm so happy with the product that I recently purchased 2 more to give to family members whose work keeps them at their desk for extended amounts of time. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to use and is helpful in regaining some balance ...
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to use and is helpful in regaining some balance that my age has hampered. The order came without the pump, but the company (Bintiva) was prompt to send another one. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Harrend

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for Flex. Seating
customer_reviews.text: I use these discs for flexible seating with my students. They enjoy them a lot (they actually enjoy the pokey side a lot more than the bumpy side). I have three colors: yellow, blue, and 'red' (the photo makes it look like magenta- and, yes, it really is magenta - which is what I was hoping for).
customer_reviews.author: C.T.

customer_reviews.title: Great concept easy to incorporate in everyday use
customer_reviews.text: I like the concept of this cushion to help improve one’s core strength and balance. It takes a bit of getting used to but after about one week I started to feel myself getting a bit better at keeping myself upright on it. Now I even get dressed whilst sitting on this cushion just to challenge myself more. The one issue that I have with this cushion is that I feel like it should be just a tad bit wider. I am 5’2” and weigh approx 105lbs and despite being a petite female this cushion seems too narrow in diameter for me.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Berniece Bean

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile
customer_reviews.text: I use this mainly for my back to lean on other than being hunched over my desk at work every day. It's made a huge difference. I sit on it when I have lower back pain. It also works great for fidgety people, like myself. I can wiggle around on it and I also rest my feet on it and move them around to "keep my busy." I have not yet had to pump it up. It came perfectly aired up for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Hudnall

customer_reviews.title: Got everyone in my office hooked.
customer_reviews.text: Everyone in my office now has one and it helps so much with back and hip pressure / pain.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for ADHD Kids
customer_reviews.text: My son uses this on his seat in school. He has ADHD, combined presentation, and is also very tactile, so he likes that he can feel the bumps. We call this his "wiggle seat". It gives him an outlet for his energy, without disturbing the other students around him. He can also use it on the floor too, since it's not attached to his seat.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni & Mike Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Love it for my Classroom!
customer_reviews.text: I am a first grade teacher and I asked for this product through a Donor’s Choose project. I put these on my students chairs with attention issues and they work SO well! Great, sturdy, and easy to blow up.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Needed to strengthen back
customer_reviews.text: I love my cushion, tried one at my fitness studio and use it at home instead of a bulky exercise ball! Showed it to my therapist, and he wants me to bring it again for my next appointment!
customer_reviews.author: Mary-Lou S. Mayfield

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a student at our church who is autistic. He has trouble sitting in his seat and focusing and his mother told me that they use this type of seat with him at school. We haven't had a lot of opportunity to use it yet, but the quality of the product did not disappoint. It is made of a sturdy rubber with small "nubs" on one side and larger "nubs" on the other. A pump was also included for easy inflation, if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: JulKel

customer_reviews.title: Many uses
customer_reviews.text: Nothing wrong with this balance disc. I did find I got a better stretch in my calves by letting my heels fall gently off one of our stairs but I still find the disc useful for push-ups, sitting, etc.
customer_reviews.author: 79stek

customer_reviews.title: I returned it and ordered another one- I really like this produce and use it everyday so that my ...
customer_reviews.text: I had an ankle fracture and my physical therapist used this "blue bubble" to train my injured leg. I found this product on Amazon and bought one for home use. The first one came but with a puncture on the other side. I returned it and ordered another one- I really like this produce and use it everyday so that my leg/ankle will regain strength. I stand on it with the single foot for 30 seconds X 3 times. It increased my ankle flexibility. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: W. Wang

customer_reviews.title: Great for other therapy
customer_reviews.text: I've been losing range of motion in my right leg due to injury years ago. I get lots of pain and stiffness . I have trouble getting up from sitting to long.also walking long distance. I have been sitting on this cushion couple times a day plus standing on it trying to balance. I noticed only after couple of days. I'm moving my leg better .Will continue to use this for therapy. I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: leaving it boarderline useless for single-leg balance exercises as I can feel the ...
customer_reviews.text: The pump that was sent does not inflate the disc. The pump doesn't create a seal with the needle, leading me to believe that I was sent either the wrong needle or the wrong pump. No air transfers to the disc, leaving it boarderline useless for single-leg balance exercises as I can feel the ground underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: I like that it came inflated
customer_reviews.text: My physical therapist suggested that I purchase a stability cushion to use at work. There are many on the market, so I just took my chances on this one. It seemed to be rated high and was more reasonably priced than many. I like that it came inflated, although I needed to let some air out for my purposes. It was easy to do so, and seems quite durable. I chose the blue and the color was true to the picture. It makes a big difference in my posture and has helped alleviate some neck/back strain.
customer_reviews.author: cowink4

customer_reviews.title: Helps with posture
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because I have had back issues for many years. Therapy several times. I saw a wobble cushion in the therapist's office, so I researched it and decided on this model due to reviews. I use it on my computer chair and have noticed a difference in my posture and how I feel. I would recommend it. I wish I had it years ago.
customer_reviews.author: S.B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for young kids
customer_reviews.text: My 5 yr old son has a very hard time sitting still, and he also lacks core strength and has poor focusing abilities. Out of everything I have tried with him, this is the one thing he has been most excited about, and most consistent with. He loves sitting on it while at the table, but he also will find just about any other way to use it (which is all helping his balance and core strength and focus!). My 3 yr old wants one now too. 😄
customer_reviews.author: Kristin B.

customer_reviews.title: Lasted only two months then cracked
customer_reviews.text: I received this on April 9th, and have used it a few times a week since for simple balance exercises. Yesterday, June 11th, it busted open while I was standing still on it with the large crack shown in the attached pictures and completely deflated. Based on the other positive reviews it's possible I simply received a defective product, but it is very frustrating that it happened less than two weeks outside the return period. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Defenestrator1618

customer_reviews.title: Has a hole and can’t return
customer_reviews.text: My daughter just brought me her wobble seat and let me know it has a hole. It’s been just over a month since we purchased this. We are four days outside of the return window. Very disappointed. She liked the seat ... before it got a hole in it.
customer_reviews.author: DeeLikesDeals

customer_reviews.title: Skip the "therapeutic" seat discs for sensory issues, just use this
customer_reviews.text: We are not using this for exercise. My son uses it to sit on for sensory feedback as a way to help him remain seated at dinner time and during homework. He has Sensory Processing Disorder and Autism Spectrum Disorder. You can buy specifically "therapeutic" discs but then the price doubles. This is the exact same thing because when it is sitting next to the one we already had, which was bought from one of those websites you can't tell the difference. Save your money! Buy this instead.
customer_reviews.author: Diana in VA

customer_reviews.title: practical way to relieve lower back pain
customer_reviews.text: The product came fast. Easy to take to and from work and practical to use. Feels like sitting on one of those exercise balls, but is more stable and cushions well on a chair. I would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Anaamazon

customer_reviews.title: Overall excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Good size, seems to be very sturdy material. Easy to inflate, and the color is vibrant. Our fidgety daughter loves it. Because it came with a list of core exercises you can do, my husband wants one now. We may end up getting them for the whole family!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: These disc are great. I'm working with a personal trainer at the ...
customer_reviews.text: These disc are great. I'm working with a personal trainer at the gym and he recommended these to me for home use and they are great. Recommend to those who want to increase balance and strength in core muscles.
customer_reviews.author: Claymaker

product_meta.title: bintiva Inflated Stability Wobble Cushion, Including Free Pump/Exercise Fitness Core Balance Disc
feature_bullets: Balance disc promotes core stability, strengthens muscle tone, improves balance and body posture.
Used as a wiggle seat to provide sensory input, and to help calm children that have a hard time sitting still.
Ergonomic seating, relieves back pain and shoulder aches
Balance cushion provides an unstable surface to exercise on, requiring you to use more muscles to stay balanced.
Ships inflated, includes a pump for adjustments. Stability disc size: 13 inches / 33 cm diameter

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
